mapper.select: select s_image, s_sname, f_coment, s_shopurl From shoppingmall s, adshoppingmall ad, favorite f, customer c where f.s_num = ad.s_num And ad.s_num = s.s_num And f.c_num = c.c_num And c.c_num = 'c00001' order by f.f_date desc
select count(*) From favorite f, customer c where f.c_num = c.c_num And c.c_num = 'c00001'
